text: Duet is a 2014 short film created by former Disney animator Glen Keane.FilmAffinity The project was done in conjunction with Google's Advanced Technology and Projects Group (ATAP)Animator Glen Keane, Google 'Duet' on Interactive Toon-Variety as part of Google's Spotlight Stories.BCDB The soundtrack was composed by Scott Stafford, produced by Alfredo Sirica and later edited by Mark Willsher. ==Plot== A celebration of life through the hand-drawn line,MUBI this film is about Mia and Tosh, two people and how growing up together to create an inspired duet.Slashfilm ==Critical reception== The film garnered an Annie Award nomination for Best Animated Short Subject LA Times and was even shortlisted for an Oscar in the same category.Animated Short 'Duet': Master Animator Glen Keane Googles It- Hollywood Reporter ==References== ==External links== * on IMDb Category:2014 films Category:American films Category:English-language films Category:2010s American animated films Category:2010s buddy films Category:2014 drama films Category:2014 fantasy films Category:2014 animated films Category:American animated fantasy films Category:American children's fantasy films Category:American coming-of-age films Category:Animated buddy films Category:Animated coming-of-age films Category:Animated drama films Category:American animated short films Category:Films directed by Glen Keane Category:Ballet films
title: Duet (2014 film)
